projects.name: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: A minimalist portfolio site built with Astro and Tailwind.

projects.name: Travel Map
projects.description: An interactive map app for planning trips. Users can drop pins, add categories, and import/export locations with a full-featured backend.

projects.name: PC Price Tracker
projects.description: Web scraper and dashboard that tracks price changes of computers from various sellers. Includes a historical price chart and filterable search.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Minimal, fast, and fully responsive portfolio website built with Astro and Tailwind. Content driven from a JSON data source.

projects.name: PDF Report Generator
projects.description: C# application that generates customizable PDF reports using QuestPDF, with a clean layout and reusable component structure.
